greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Index j of prime p(j) such that Floor[p(j)/j]=n is first satisfied.
link: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..50
formula: a(n) = Min{j| Floor[p(j)/j] = n}. Note that neither p(j)/j nor Floor[p(j)/j] is monotonic.
a(n) = A038606(n) = A038624(n) for n >= 3. [From _Jaroslav Krizek_, Dec 13 2009]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 12 2001
ext: a(17)-a(28) from Farideh Firoozbakht and _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 13 2005
a(29)-a(50) obtained from the values of A038625 computed by _Jan Büthe_. - _Giovanni Resta_, Sep 01 2018
